name: 毕达哥拉斯
bio_short: 古希腊哲学家、数学家和神秘主义者，毕达哥拉斯学派的创始人。他以“万物皆数”的理念、毕达哥拉斯定理和灵魂轮回说而闻名。
bio_short_en: A Greek philosopher, mathematician, and mystic who founded the Pythagorean brotherhood. He is famous for the concept 'All is number,' the Pythagorean theorem, and the doctrine of metempsychosis (transmigration of souls).
